page.title: 20WHERE WE SHOP
page.content: MOST PEOPLE GO TO ASDA TO SHOP,ASDA IS AN EDGE OF TOWN SUPERMARKET.OTHER PEOPLE SHOP IN BARROW TOWN CENTRE & IN DALTON-IN-FURNESS WHICH IS NEARER. THE VILLAGE STORE/POST OFFICE SELLS A VERY LIMITED RANGE OF FOOD & DRINK, APART FROM STAMPS & OTHER POSTAL ITEMS. PEOPLE TRAVEL TO DO THEIR SHOPPING BY CAR.YOU CAN GO BY BUS BUT THERE ARE ONLY 4 BUSES EACH DAY THEY ARE AS FOLLOWS:- 1)NEWTON TO BARROW VIA DALTON.(BARROW CORPORATION). 2)A RIBBLE BUS WHICH ARRIVES IN NEWTON FROM MILLOM & DALTON THIS GOES ON TO URSWICK & ULVERSTON.(A VERY ROUND-ABOUT ROUTE)3)A RIBBLE SCHOOL BUS FROM DALTON.4)A RIBBLE BUS FROM DALTON VIA NEWTON TO KIRKBY IN FURNESS.
